document.full_text: the complaint asks the court to disgorge david sokol's trading profits in lubrizol and to award damages because of the damage done to berkshire hathaway's goodwill.
document.title: buffett and sokol sued over trading in lubrizol shares
lines_and_colors: the complaint asks the court to disgorge david sokol's trading profits in lubrizol and to award damages because of the damage done to berkshire hathaway's goodwill.
